name: Naianism
founderBelief: Divine Restoration — +2 Faith for every Jungle tile worked
followerBelief: Harmony of Life — +1 Happiness for every 2 followers in a city
enhancerBelief: Path of the Ancients — Missionaries can enter rival territory without open borders
worshipBelief: Pyramid of Echoes — +2 Culture and +1 Faith from Shrines
description: Naianism is a spiritual tradition rooted in reverence for nature, ancestral wisdom, and the eternal cycle of life and restoration. Followers believe that jungles are sacred realms where the divine manifests, and that harmony with the natural world brings prosperity and enlightenment.
